name: Divine Regalia
description: So magnificent, it cannot abide failure.

abilities.name: Exalted
notes: When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the outgoing damage amplification is increased by 30%
Dying disgraces the regalia, making it lose its bonus, as well as its enchantment

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
When dying, replaces this artifact with the Disgraced Regalia
The Disgraced Regalia has no bonuses, and loses the chosen enchantment as well
If held by Techies with the Spoon's Stash Facet, only the chosen tier 5 enchantment is lost
If the wielder had Dormant Curio, its Unleashed Enchantment is lost as well
When re-crafting a tier 5 neutral item, the Disgraced Regalia will be available as a 4th option, as the currently owned artifact
If chosen, the new enchantment chosen along with it will work normally
Dying again does not cause the newly chosen enchantment to get lost
The Divine Regalia can still appear amongst the other 3 options when re-crafting, since the disgraced version is a separate artifact
